TextView.android:text: I greet you with Assalamu Alaikum (peace be unto you) and extend to you a warm welcome to the ICC website. Our mission is to serve society by disseminating knowledge of Islamic philosophy, faith, culture and traditions. Recently, the following spectacular international festivities came together starting with Christmas, New Year, Eid-ul-Adha and the New Year of the Islamic calendar 1428 Hijra and the first day of Muharram - all these events of the Gregorian and Islamic calendar are coming together. Actually the Christmas of 25 December was few days before Eid-ul-Adha, i.e. 30 December. Similarly, the Gregorian New Year of 2007 is going to be very close to the New Year of the Islamic calendar of 1428 Hijra this time.

I, the Director General of the Islamic Cultural Centre and The London Central Mosque, would like to draw our attention more to the relations between the two faiths, Christianity and Islam, more to the Divine source of the two faiths and their message of love, tolerance, good relations, doing good to other people. We have to remember these are the real messages of Islam, Christianity and Judaism and we have to establish these in this world for the betterment and peace in this global village

I am wishing everybody belonging to all faith communities ever-lasting happiness in the coming year and asking everybody to try to do his/her best for better society, relations and understanding so that we can have a very peaceful globe and peace emanates everywhere in the world. Global harmony is our goal.
